model

Interface IBetFairCore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BetfairCore

    public interface IBetFairCore
    Interface defining methods that the implementation of betfair must implement
    Author:
    Craig

    • Method Detail

      • listEvents

        java.util.List<MarketCatalogue> listEvents(MarketFilter filter)
        Get the event list for the sport(s) that are in the parameters
        Parameters:
        filter - MarketFilter object containing parameters for the request
        Returns:
        List of MarketCatalogue objects representing games for the given sport thats in the filter

      • listEventTypes

        java.util.List<EventTypeResult> listEventTypes(MarketFilter filter)
        Get a list of eventTypes which represent the sports that have games for betting
        Parameters:
        filter - MarketFilter object containing parameters for the request
        Returns:
        List of EventTypeResult objects representing sports than have games to bet on

      • listMarketBook

        java.util.List<MarketBook> listMarketBook(java.util.List<java.lang.String> marketIds,
                                          PriceProjection priceProjection,
                                          OrderProjection orderProjection)
        Get a list of MarketBook objects which contain live odds data for the given markets
        Parameters:
        marketIds - List of market ids for which the request is for
        priceProjection - Options for ordering of price
        orderProjection -
        Returns:
        List of MarketBook objects where each represents live data for one of the given markets

      • login

        LoginResponse login(java.lang.String username,
                    java.lang.String password,
                    java.lang.String filePassword,
                    java.io.File certificateFile)
        Attempts to log into betfair
        Parameters:
        username - BetFair account username
        password - BetFair account password
        filePassword - BetFairs certificate file password
        the - users certificate file
        Returns:
        a LoginResponse object containing the result of the attempted log in
        Throws:
        CryptoException - if certificate file password is incorrect
